title: KKR Co-CEOs Henry Kravis and George Roberts Step Down
sub_head: Joe Bae and Scott Nuttall take over as co-CEOs of the private-equity firm
body:
Henry Kravis and George Roberts are stepping down as co-chief executive officers of KKR & Co., as the founders of the seminal private-equity firm become the latest to pass the torch to handpicked successors.
Joe Bae and Scott Nuttall, who have served as the firmâ€™s co-presidents since July 2017, will become co-CEOs, effective immediately, KKR said Monday.
